info.title: Dynamics 365 Business Central
info.description: Dynamics 365 Business Central is a business management solution for small and mid-sized organizations that automates and streamlines business processes and helps you manage your business.

get.summary: Gets company metadata (V2)
get.description: Retrieves all company metadata available to the connection

get.summary: Get records (V2)
get.description: Retrieves Dynamics 365 Business Central records of a certain Dynamics 365 Business Central type (example: 'Suggestion')

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Name of the Dynamics 365 Business Central company

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Name of the Dynamics 365 Business Central table

parameters.name: $apply
parameters.description: A sequence of OData aggregation transformations

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.description: The Dynamics 365 Business Central company.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Name of the Dynamics 365 Business Central API category (also called API route).

parameters.name: blobnavigationpath
parameters.description: The OData path to the image, file or document, not including the IDs (use the picker for a better experience).

get.summary: For a selected record (V3)
get.description: Triggers a flow for a selected Dynamics 365 Business Central record.

parameters.name: bcenvironment
parameters.description: The Business Central environment where this flow can be run (leave it empty to let the flow run in any environment).

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: The Business Central company where this flow can be run (leave it empty to let the flow run in any company).

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The Business Central page or table that this flow will run against, such as "TABLE18" or "PAGE21,PAGE22" (these filters are not translated; see also https://aka.ms/bcautomate).

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: Row with updated values

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: Row with updated values

ApprovalWebHookResponse.description: The response which includes information about an approval workflow webhook.

Environment Name.description: The name of the environment where the record is (supported from Business Central version 21.4).

Company Id.description: The ID of the company where the record is (supported from Business Central version 21.4).

Workflow Step Id.description: System ID of the Business Central workflow step.

Requested By User Email.description: Email address for the user requesting the approval.

UrlKey.description: Gets or sets the BC environment key.

DisplayableKey.description: Gets or sets the BC environment display name.

Name.description: Gets or sets the BC environment name.

ProductFamily.description: Gets or sets the BC environment product family.

ProductFamilyPrefix.description: Gets or sets the URL prefix associated with the product family.

companies.description: Companies contained in the BC environment.

value.description: Gets or sets the list of BC environments.

BcRecordDetails.description: The details of the Business Central record that triggered the flow.

EnvironmentName.description: The name of the Business Central environment where the flow was triggered.

CompanyId.description: The ID of the Business Central company where the flow was triggered.

TableId.description: The Business Central table that stores the record that triggered the flow.

SystemId.description: The System ID of the Business Central record that triggered the flow.

PageId.description: The Business Central page where the flow was triggered.

WebClientUrl.description: The URL to reach the record that triggered the flow from the browser.

ClientState.description: Represents the state that is stored when creating a webhook subscription.

ClientSubscriptionRequest.description: A request made to the client to create a subscription.

NotificationUrl.description: Gets/sets the callback URL to the Flow/LA engine. Expected as part of the request and provided by Flow/LA.

ClientSubscriptionResponse.description: Subscription response model that is sent back to external subscribers (Flow/LA).

id.description: Gets/sets the id of the subscription.

resource.description: Gets/sets the resource of the subscription.

notificationType.description: Gets/sets the notification type of the subscription.

notificationUrl.description: Gets/sets the notification URL of the subscription.

renewInterval.description: Gets/sets the renewal interval for the subscription.

Id.description: Gets or sets the company ID.

DisplayName.description: Gets or sets the company display name.

value.description: Gets or sets the list of companies.

CustomerApprovalSubscription.description: Describes the subscription information for a customer approval webhook.

NotificationUrl.description: Callback url to the flow engine. It's expected as part of the request and provided by flow.
